projects.name: Co-Founder & Lead Developer - Moontalk
projects.description: Social Media Network for Cryptocurrency Ethusiasts
projects.stack: ReactJS, NodeJS, MongoDB, Webpack, Babel, PostCSS
responsibilities: Developed a live Twitter style tweet system with likes, reply threads, reports, etc powered by Web Sockets
Developed a Portfolio Management system for cryptocurrency assets
Developed a feeder for parsing and aggregating rss news feeds from multiple sources, along with tagging algorithm for extraction of mentioned cryptocurrencies
Developed a feeder which hits multiple cryptocurrency exchange APIs and aggregates prices for each cryptocurrency using NodeJS clusters
Developed RESTful API secured by JSON Web Tokens
Extensive use of ES2015,2016,2017 include async/await
Winner - 1st Place CSUN Fast Pitch Startup Competition (http://csunfastpitch.com)
https://moontalk.io

projects.name: Lead Developer - Datex Base Portal

projects.stack: C#, AngularJS, T-SQL, Entity Framework, Web API 2, Bootstrap
responsibilities: Led a team of three junior developers
Designed System
Designed responsive UI
Developed an algorithm using b-trees to handle context-menu navigation in a single page application
Developed secure RESTful APIs using Microsoft Web API 2 with Identity Framework
Developed a library of AngularJS directives to simplify development

projects.name: School Project - Witch Hunt
projects.description: Worked with three other team members to develop, document, and present a multiplayer browser game.
responsibilities: Designed and developed a system for players to interact and chat in real-time using Web Sockets.
Game includes lobbies, player profiles, and leader boards.
